img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Wukong_Brook_6.jpg)
This secret spot can be found by going right down the hill from the Forest of Felicity and down to the end of the Brook of Bliss' stream.
img_below_text:
When you reach a cliff with some braziers, look down to find a spot to drop into a large open cave with a large Buddha Statue.
![Wukong Martial 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c4/Wukong_Martial_1.jpg)
summary_promot:

This secret spot can be found by going right down the hill from the Forest of Felicity and down to the end of the Brook of Bliss' stream."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts the player character from *Black Myth: Wukong* standing on a snowy cliff edge near a lit brazier. This location appears to be part of a secret area mentioned in the preceding text, accessible from the Brook of Bliss' stream. The following text suggests the player is about to descend into a large cave containing a Buddha statue, indicating this is a transitional point leading to the next exploration area.
